text: The bust of David Oppenheimer is installed in Vancouver's Stanley Park, in British Columbia, Canada.https://www.vancouverheritagefoundation.org/location/david-oppenheimer- statue/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:Busts in Canada Category:Monuments and memorials in Vancouver Category:Outdoor sculptures in Vancouver Category:Sculptures of men in Canada Category:Stanley Park
title: Bust of David Oppenheimer
